SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_city (PROVINCE_NAME, NAME, FREIGHT, FREIGHT_BASE_AMOUNT, IS_DREDGED, IS_HOT, DREDGE_TIME, IS_DEFAULT) values (#{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freightBaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDredged,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, #{dredgeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update:
update rc_city
PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREIGHT = #{freight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FREIGHT_BASE_AMOUNT = #{freightBaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DREDGED = #{isDredged,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT},
DREDGE_TIME = #{dredgeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT},
where CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CITY_ID, PROVINCE_NAME, NAME, FREIGHT, FREIGHT_BASE_AMOUNT, IS_DREDGED, IS_HOT, DREDGE_TIME, IS_DEFAULT from rc_city where CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
